description:
PngOptimizer is a graphics and command line tool to optimize PNGs and convert other lossless formats (GIF, BMP, TGA) into optimized PNGs.
    
### Features
* Cleans your PNG files of useless or wrong information.
* Reduces your PNG files' data size.
* Converts into PNG other lossless image formats (BMP, GIF, TGA).
* Supports animated PNG (APNG).
* Creates easily available PNG screenshots.
* Perform all tasks in a simple and efficient way.
summary: Optimize PNG images and convert other lossless format images to PNG
author: Hadrien Nilsson
